definition: fig. romantic relationship between an elderly couple/falling in love in the autumn of one's life

sentences.english: It was dusk when the hunter drove into the barn and unhitched his horse.
sentences.chinese: 当猎人驾驶入谷仓并且放松了他的马，它是黄昏。

sentences.english: An air strike killed five people in a mosque as dusk fell.
sentences.chinese: 黄昏时一次空袭打死了清真寺里的5个人。

sentences.english: The evening sky is red, long shot of laughter.
sentences.chinese: 黄昏天发红，渔翁笑声隆。

sentences.english: White cloud blue crystal, evening mans the sunset west Yang.
sentences.chinese: 白芒浮云蓝晶莹，黄昏之日落西阳。

sentences.english: Hours passed and the evening is drawing in.
sentences.chinese: 好几个小时过去了，快接近黄昏了。

sentences.english: The hot day air dispersed with the evenfall.
sentences.chinese: 白天的热气随着黄昏的到来而消散。

sentences.english: Where now we gather in linden's shadow at eventide.
sentences.chinese: 黄昏时刻，我们在菩提树下召集。

sentences.english: At twilight, the sky is suffuse with color.
The two angels came to Sodom at evening.
sentences.chinese: 黄昏时，那两位使者来到了索多玛。

sentences.english: The chamber was lighted by the fire on the hearth and the twilight falling through the window.
sentences.chinese: 房间利用火炉的光和从窗子透进来的黄昏天色来照明。

sentences.english: It was dusk by the time the basket-maker returned.
sentences.chinese: 黄昏时分老制篮商回来了。

sentences.english: Every dusk, mother would waddles home with a heavy sack on her back.
sentences.chinese: 每天黄昏，母亲都背着重重的袋子蹒跚而归。

sentences.english: We were still there at dusk, when we pulled in to Kimberley.
sentences.chinese: 黄昏时分，我们仍在往金伯利行进。

sentences.english: Birds rest in wild verdure where dusk forgets Qin's courts of yore;
sentences.chinese: 鸟儿栖息在野绿之中，此处的黄昏遗忘了古代的秦苑。

sentences.english: You'll most likely see these animals at twilight .
sentences.chinese: 黄昏时公你很可能会看到这些动物。

sentences.english: In the evening it ripens into a spinlden fruit of memory.
sentences.chinese: 在黄昏中，这花幼稚为一颗记忆的金果。

definition: the sun sets in the west (idiom)
first rays of morning sun/first glimmer of dawn
variant of 餘暉|余晖[yu2 hui1]
night scene/the dim light of night
